post:
![](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/E86-23XXIAIrrfg?format=jpg&name=medium "")

We now have services available IonSwitch's Coeur d'Alene, ID datacenter.

Coeur d'Alene is on the border of Idaho and Washington. The city name is long so I decided to let this location be known as Spokane, WA since Spokane is a larger city only a few minutes away from Coeur d'Alene.

IPv6 is unavailable right now but will be in the next 48 hours.


**Features:**

* Fast Intel PCIe NVMe drives in RAID1
* Free DirectAdmin License on any plan
* We own our IPv4 space
* We own and operate our own infrastructure
* IPv6 on all plans
* SolusVM/KVM - rDNS supported
* We accept Credit Card, PayPal, AliPay, Boleto, OXXO, Cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, ADA, and more),


**Looking Glasses:**
Las Vegas, NV:
http://lv.hostodo.com/

Miami, FL:
http://mia.hostodo.com/

Spokane, WA:
http://wa.hostodo.com/
